Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mech. problem on a train at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at UIC-Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
